amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. Appropriations made in this Act are hereby reduced in the amount of $178,120,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the appropriations by $178,120,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 322 (Roll no. 186).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Hefley.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
